name: Tessera Futbalum
description:
Tessera Futballum. An action game taking place in an antic roman coliseum.

Your only way to defend yourself, is a Tessera, a dice you can launch on gladiators.

Be careful, gladiators are in differents colors, so to kill them, the dice must match their colors, or they would just stun them for a little bit of time.

COMMAND
  • Z,Q,S,D or arrows : Move.
  • Target with mouth.
  • Left Click : Launch the dice on ennemis.
  • Right Click : Launch dice to reroll it.
THE TEAM

Aurélien MEUNIER: Game design

David BRUNEL : 3D art

Simon M : Game development

Vélimir : Game development

Ghislain Thiery : Game development

Pougrivioure : Sound design / Music

Game developped in 50h during GMTK Game Jam 2022
